revised_title: An Account of Earthquakes in Colen, Liege, Maestricht, and Surrounding Areas in 1756
tldr: The author, Abraham Trembley, reports on an earthquake felt in Colen, Liege, Maestricht, and surrounding areas on November 19, 1756. He also discusses a similar earthquake experienced in Portugal and the ongoing observations of earthquakes in the region. The author leaves it to the reader to decide if this information is worth communicating to the Royal Society.
